original_title: The Making Of Cataclasm, Episode 2: Draumstafir
overview: The most important part of any creative endeavor is, in my opinion, the inspiration. The landscape and world of Iceland blew my creativity out of the water and propelled it into outer space. The place is like another planet - beaches of black sand, huge fields of volcanic rock sprawling as far as the eye can see, geysers and volcanos - it really heavily affected me, and brought out some interesting stuff. In this second episode, “Draumstafir” (Dream Characters), I talk about the environment there and how it inspired me.
tagline: Cat"a*clasm\ n. A breaking asunder; a violent disruption.
title: The Making Of Cataclasm, Episode 2: Draumstafir
